question: Are there any features of the property shared in common with adjoining landowners or a home-owner's association, such as walls, fences or driveways? If yes, describe below
Are there any electric or gas utility surcharges for line extensions, special assessments or home-owner or other association fees that apply to the property? If yes, describe below
Are there certificates of occupancy related to the property? If no, explain below
Is any or all of the property located in a designated floodplain? If yes, explain below
Is any or all of the property located in a designated wetland? If yes, explain below
Is the property located in an agricultural district? If yes, explain below
Was the property ever the site of a landfill? If yes, explain below.
Are there or have been fuel storage tanks above or below the ground on the property? If yes, are they currently in use?
Are there asbestos in the structure? If yes, state location or locations below.
